//: This file is used by the development environment to specify application metadata.
The 'requestFramePermissions' array tells the host environment (like a development frame or a specific deployment platform) what browser permissions the application needs to function correctly.
name: UrbanSenseAI
description: An agentic AI application to help visually impaired individuals navigate urban environments by providing real-time audio descriptions of their surroundings using a smartphone camera and Gemini AI.
